column1: This funding is key to bolstering salmon in our rivers! Now that my sea lion bill has been signed into law I'm moving forward with our next crucial step in protecting our salmon population -- increasing hatchery production and protecting their habitat. https://t.co/mdw5muSYnw

If disaster strikes we want to be sure that relief gets to the communities that need it as soon as possible. That's why I cosponsored The Fishery FUNDD Act which would expedite relief disbursement & allow funds to be directed to community members affected by a fishery disaster. https://t.co/DdCGscPzKY

It's better for both employers & workers to provide women with reasonable accommodations at work during pregnancy -- a bottle of water an extra bathroom break or a stool. I was pleased to cosponsor the Pregnant Workers Fairness Act to make this possible! https://t.co/lw6sHPS2HK

Having given birth to 3 children while serving in Congress I recognize the opportunity to promote maternal health in the U.S. That's why I cofounded the bipartisan Maternity Care Caucus & continue fighting for legislation that prioritizes maternal health! https://t.co/y4U9bEFhr6

I proudly cosponsored the Advancing Support for Working Families Act - a bill that would give new parents a necessary boost during their 1st year. This legislation would allow working families in #WA03 to use the Child Tax Credit when they need it most! https://t.co/R1T6Vt0xWU

As someone who grew up here and played basketball at Prairie High School it’s great to see the success of Southwest Washington athletes like Kahlil.  Congratulations you have a bright future ahead of you! #WA03 https://t.co/NYms6293Tf

As a mom of 3 I'm very familiar with the unique set of hurdles working parents face in #WA03. In Congress I promise to continue fighting for solutions regarding maternal & infant health child care & other legislation that will support working families! https://t.co/K1D7jfrjn8

I proudly cosponsored The Comprehensive Immunosuppressive Drug Coverage for Kidney Transplant Patients Act in Congress! This bipartisan legislation would provide needed support for transplant recipients by expanding their access to life saving medications! https://t.co/jE1zfVCkt1
Happy New Year Southwest Washington! May you and your family have a healthy and prosperous 2020! #WA03 https://t.co/C3Tod9HRXu

For the first time in years Wild winter steelhead are passing over Willamette Falls without a deadly wall of predators — thanks to sea lion control. Wildlife managers are optimistic that my legislation will deliver similar results on the Columbia River! https://t.co/YQmCyj6HS6
I’m thankful to spend this holiday season with my family in a community as warm and beautiful as ours. Merry Christmas Southwest Washington! https://t.co/y14LOJaJer

“It’s time we put a stop to these illegal robocalls placed consumers back in charge & punished the fraudsters.”  Many of the scam robocalls the TRACED Act will address nefariously seek personal & financial information from vulnerable populations. #WA03 https://t.co/XIAvE5W2Lz

We’ll finally be sending to President Trump’s desk the U.S. - Mexico - Canada Agreement that could create up to 176K jobs & $68 billion in economic activity in the U.S. I was proud to support a trade deal that'll bring jobs & economic success to #WA03! https://t.co/e3lXo6iFYj

I'm excited that the bipartisan TRACED Act is headed to President Trump's desk. I was pleased to support this legislation which requires phone companies to block scam robocalls for free & requires carriers to ensure that calls are from real numbers! #WA03 https://t.co/X2DflePD0X

Short of voting to send our troops to the battlefield impeaching a sitting president is the most consequential responsibility we hold as United States Representatives. Please see my stance on today's impeachment votes in the House: https://t.co/TmLrbt3raS

Congress must commit to providing quality medical care for the brave men & women who serve our country. I was proud to see my Reserve Medical Officer Parity Act pass in Congress last week along with the rest of the National Defense Authorization Act! #WA03 https://t.co/OWOBMdhYHZ

Congress needs to act now to lower prescription costs. I'm supporting a bipartisan solution that'll help people manage their diabetes blood pressure & other chronic conditions & still be able to pay their other bills. Folks shouldn't have to choose. #WA03 https://t.co/dCgMnqwpsD
Congratulations to the Camas Papermakers for their state Championship win last night! It was a proud moment for Clark County and all of Southwest Washington! #wa03 https://t.co/WF4E974euP

It's great to see that the unemployment rate continues to fall to 3.5% & average hourly earnings over the last 12 months are up 3.1%. Rolling back burdensome regs & creating an environment where small businesses can thrive is a priority for me in Congress. https://t.co/vHGw8Q7LVS

Medically necessary food is a matter of life or death for some. That's why I reintroduced the MNEA which would provide public & private insurance coverage for medically necessary foods for digestive & inherited metabolic disorders for folks like Owen! https://t.co/Uxsf6VUScd

Scam robocallers are a burdensome threat to residents of #wa03 & across the U.S. often preying on elderly populations & health care consumers. I proudly supported the TRACED Act which passed in Congress yesterday. This will help hold these callers accountable for their crimes! https://t.co/COXEqIEFW8

I'm pleased to see so many of my colleagues back this bipartisan legislation fighting the maternal mortality crisis in the U.S. These 2 bills I’m helping lead will save vulnerable moms by incentivizing states to extend Medicare coverage through postpartum. https://t.co/lNprby2E61

Public transportation is a crucial part of residents' daily lives in Longview & Kelso. As a member of the House Appropriations Committee I was proud to secure funding to replace 4 outdated buses to provide safe reliable transportation in Cowlitz County! https://t.co/EPqAJatH9C
Happy Thanksgiving Southwest Washington! May you and your family have a pleasant and restful day. #wa03 https://t.co/O8q2nhlTjG

U.S. women are more likely to die of pregnancy-related conditions after giving birth than during pregnancy. I was proud to cosponsor the Helping MOMS Act which would help vulnerable new moms access medical treatment for a year after they've given birth. https://t.co/FXNJu4FD7m

I was pleased to reintroduce my Fire Department Proper Response and Equipment Prioritization Act. This bipartisan legislation will prioritize resources for local fire depts. & first responders to take action in the event of an oil-by-rail accident. #wa03 https://t.co/4aVzFqNqPY

It was truly humbling to hear from local military veterans last Friday. I've felt honored to partake in our Veterans History Project which will allow the stories of these American heroes to be preserved in the Library of Congress for years to come! #wa03 https://t.co/Imu2McdfMb

We cannot simply ignore the consequences Americans would face under Senator Warren's plan to have the government take over your health care. Eliminating private insurers would result in higher taxes and lower quality health care for Americans. #wa03 https://t.co/QS1DBAyVVv https://t.co/j29Ek0HQSX
Today we honor all those who have risked their lives for the safety and freedom of our great nation. Thank you for your service to our country! #wa03 https://t.co/JrcuR7SWiQ

I am pleased to have helped secure federal grants for #wa03 school districts & youth-focused agencies for drug abuse prevention. Through my position in Congress I'll keep supporting local coalitions as they help our young men & women make healthy choices. https://t.co/rNM7d5JnPQ

I just dropped my ballot off at the Battle Ground ballot box. Reminder: ballots must be postmarked today (postage is prepaid!) or dropped off at your county’s ballot box by 8:00 pm this evening. https://t.co/AMNgt5N5H2

Working to pass effective sensible legislation for the residents of Southwest Washington will always be among my top priorities in Congress. Thank you Brad for your encouraging words in the Columbian! #WA03 https://t.co/sTFZy37DcR

I'm so thankful that our bipartisan JOBS Act is gaining momentum in Congress! The formal endorsement of the Problem Solvers Caucus will help advance this legislation to address the growing skills gap & allow folks to gain upward mobility for themselves. https://t.co/IMv3jdxaH8

1/3 of all women in the U.S. die from heart disease or stroke. To tackle this tragic and severe health crisis I proudly introduced a resolution last Friday to call for gender-specific cardiovascular research prevention treatment and policy. #WA03 https://t.co/gBuikvPjx6

Southwest Washington is blessed to call WWII veteran Harold McCarty a longstanding member of our community. What an incredible amount he's accomplished in his 100 years. His bravery and dedication to our country is an inspiration to us all! https://t.co/Vy86qJT1rK #WA03

Had a productive discussion with law enforcement & medical professionals about the opioid epidemic in Cowlitz County. I will continue listening to community members' concerns & insight as we strengthen our approach to combatting opioid addiction in #WA03 https://t.co/h1VYY8HHtX

Pleased to hear the @FCC heeded our request that they protect the viability of earthquake early warning systems. Earthquakes are a major threat in #WA03 & the precious time afforded by alert systems will allow residents to find safety before disaster hits. https://t.co/V84GqUEfBB

The affordable housing crisis has hit Southwest Washington particularly hard. That's why I introduced a bipartisan legislative solution to remove barriers to affordable housing through increased transparency in land use zoning & housing decisions. https://t.co/VzTmexMlxi #WA03

I'm proud to introduce bipartisan legislation that will make permanent the self-sustaining Special Forest Products pilot program. The bill would let folks enjoy resources available on public land & encourage responsible stewardship of our National Forests! https://t.co/9GU0vIt2QW

Oregon doesn't intend to use revenue from their tolling scheme to improve infrastructure used by #WA03 commuters but will unfairly use us as a revenue source without providing benefits. We need Gov Inslee to recommit his opposition to OR's tolling scheme! https://t.co/QPva51h0mi

Thank you to The Columbian for recognizing my efforts to prevent unfair tolls on I-5 and I-205. I will always work to protect Southwest Washington residents from becoming a piggy bank for Oregon's unfair tolling scheme. #WA03 https://t.co/rySdBPsLWv

I'm pleased that our effort to secure grants for the Vancouver Fire Dept. was a success! These funds will help provide Vancouver firefighters with tools to protect our community by supporting 2 crucial projects and I was proud to help push them through. https://t.co/ZtnDGlmKNL
Let us honor and remember the innocent Americans who lost their lives 18 years ago today in the horrific terrorist attacks on September 11 2001. We will never forget! https://t.co/v39xl5HUZS

WA state has one of the highest rates of chronic absenteeism which makes students 68% less likely to graduate than those with regular attendance. I was proud to introduce the Chronic Absenteeism Reduction for Every School Act which will empower schools to fight absenteeism! #WA03 https://t.co/jB9wUxun4z

Oregon’s unfair tolling scheme treats #WA03 commuters as a source of revenue without providing them with any benefit. @GovInslee must not waver in his opposition to Oregon's proposal to toll I-5 and I-205 at the state border! https://t.co/IqmsApwPp6
I'm wishing all the hard working residents of Southwest Washington a relaxing day off with family and friends! #WA03 https://t.co/2c2KVOJkRg

I'm wishing #WA03 a happy #WomensEqualityDay! Today we celebrate 99 years since the ratification of the 19th Amendment which gave women the right to vote and paved the way for the many strong and influential women who make the United States the great nation it is! https://t.co/IgDt3ys86o

I was very excited to hear that the @CDCgov will be issuing its first round of funding to allow my Preventing Maternal Deaths Act to take effect across the country. This money will support critical efforts to combat a crisis situation & save mothers’ lives! #WA03 https://t.co/VcyvU1pDF3

My Student Loan Disclosure Transparency Act of 2019 which would mandate monthly disclosure statements to students detailing personalized information about their loan would be an important step forward for students and in tackling the nation’s student loan debt crisis! #WA03 https://t.co/70FaVvJ0ca
Fighting for residents of Southwest Washington will always be of utmost importance to me. Thank you Dalton for your encouraging words to The Reflector! https://t.co/MukzVDZ9aD

It is an honor to receive the 2019 Congressional Biosecurity Champion Award from the Alliance for Biosecurity! Public health and safety are incredibly important to me. I plan to always fight biosecurity threats against Southwest Washington and the United States. #WA03 https://t.co/j9r6Gbp5Pw

I always aim to put the people of Southwest Washington above party politics. Working across party lines and keeping residents' best interest at heart is a priority for me. Thank you Casey for your supportive words in the Reflector. https://t.co/KUbjftQRcs #WA03

As a mother I'm proud to co-sponsor the Newborn Screening Saves Lives Reauthorization Act of 2019 that recently passed the House! This will help save lives & prevent severe disabilities by expanding newborn screening programs & improving lab quality https://t.co/A8hTEF6NHc #WA03

Unlawful robo calls have been troubling for the people of Southwest Washington often targeting healthcare consumers and our elderly. I’m so happy that our legislation to crack down on these burdensome and often predatory calls has passed in the House. https://t.co/KNkdV9S0tW

At a time when maternity care is at a crisis level in our country addressing the care provider shortage is key. That's why I've introduced the Midwives for MOMs Act which would establish two new funding streams for midwifery education. #WA03 https://t.co/0oKQRNySk7

I was proud to cosponsor bipartisan legislation that recently passed the House to repeal the ‘Cadillac Tax’ on health care plans. This is a huge step towards increasing lower and middle class workers’ access to healthcare! https://t.co/WR2yLMlVpL #WA03

Dams are critical to Washington’s economy. I'll always work toward solutions that help protect our environment and our precious salmon populations while also boosting our economy. #WA03 https://t.co/OjI0F0dR9w

I can’t wait to see everyone at our 5th Annual Country BBQ and Picnic! Dinner and dessert will be served along with face painting balloon artists and lawn games for the whole family! RSVP to Anitra Zipperer at Anitra@voteJaime.com or 360-597-3065. #WA03 https://t.co/bDzl1HGRzN
Working hard for the people of Southwest Washington is my highest priority. Thank you Bob for sharing your words of support! https://t.co/97NSYCkEcX #WA03

Thank you to the Cowlitz PUD commissioners for their unanimous vote to support 4 lower Snake River dams that will serve as an important source of hydropower in WA! Keeping our hydropower system intact is vital for Washington jobs AND the environment. https://t.co/tQuaTt9nfd #WA03

I'm honored to receive the “Champion for Children’s Health” award from the Children’s Hospital Association for my bipartisan ACE Kids Act. This legislation will help improve access to quality care and necessary treatments for children in the most dire medical situations. #WA03 https://t.co/UlebCHayHw

It's important that we empower our young people and those seeking the tools to get better-paying jobs. I'm co-sponsoring the JOBS Act to help expand access to skills training and open up opportunities for hardworking Americans.  https://t.co/VreksFSLgA #WA03

Happy #4thofJuly Southwest Washington! We're so blessed to live in this beautiful nation and enjoy the unique freedoms we have as Americans. My family and I are wishing you a safe fun holiday! #WA03 https://t.co/0xsrWztnSu

Our bill to support home loans for active duty Purple Heart recipients has officially been signed into law! American heroes deserve access to affordable homes -- this bill will support these patriots and their families. https://t.co/GjaTIm42xo  #WA03

The crisis at the border must be addressed immediately. I voted in favor of increased resources for the Defense Department and Immigrations and Customs Enforcement to ensure that immigration authorities have what they need to do their jobs. https://t.co/yJbzil9mwE #WA03

❌70% tax rate? ❌abolishing private insurers? ❌decriminalizing illegal border crossings?  Many Democratic candidates for president would take our nation in an almost unfathomable (and harmful) direction on so many fronts. https://t.co/pmL80m2uoC #DemocraticDebate2020 #WA03

This is very promising news. We should continue improving #salmon runs by seeking out common sense solutions like increasing hatchery production and minimizing sea lion predation in Southwest Washington waters. https://t.co/mMUSTzVKpU #WA03
Our bill would be a huge step forward in developing solutions to a problem facing so many Americans today. https://t.co/SfXjN2iDnC #WA03 (2/2)

#affordablehousing is a growing issue for families nationwide and right here in Southwest Washington. I’m pleased to co-sponsor HR-3211-- which would create a Congressional task force to study the impact this situation has on American families. https://t.co/SfXjN2iDnC #WA03 (1/2)

Sea lion removal is a critical step towards saving our fish and I’m going to closely monitor the new removal tools I helped secure into law to ensure they're implemented as quickly as possible. (2/2) https://t.co/6HgNy5EUW3

Sea lions coming up the Columbia to gorge on salmon are a greater threat than ever before. Our endangered salmon and steelhead populations need to recover but they can’t without our help. (1/2) https://t.co/6HgNy5EUW3 #WA03
I’m thrilled that we are one step closer to making #homeownership feasible for active duty service members who put their lives on the line for our country. (2/2) https://t.co/DCVF0JzP2c #WA03
Our bill to make the dream of owning a home a reality for those serving our country is headed to the Senate! (1/2)
Happy #FlagDay and Happy Birthday to the U.S. Army! We are so thankful to those serve and very lucky to live in the greatest nation on Earth. #ArmyBDay https://t.co/pp2jagopPS
It is vital to protect our #fishing industry and thousands of #jobs in our coastal communities. I look forward to it being signed into law. #WA03 https://t.co/fdz1ooumW1 (2/2)
I am ecstatic to announce that my Ocean Acidification Innovation Act has been passed by the House with bipartisan support! (1/2)

I've been listening to the sportsmen commercial fishermen and tribes of Southwest Washington who have been advocating for this effort and their voices are making a difference. Read more here: https://t.co/SZrJpSobsY #WA03
Abundant #salmon resources must be part of our future and I'm increasingly hopeful now that a plan to increase hatchery production is moving forward through Congress.

In the face of one of the most evil dictators history has ever seen America & its allies stormed the beaches of Normandy 75 years ago to save the free world from ruin. Today we honor their bravery & remember those who made the ultimate sacrifice for freedom #DDay75thAnniversary https://t.co/7Uxik4WTf3

As a mother of three I too am concerned about the access America’s young people have to tobacco smoking and vaping products. I support raising the legal age to purchase tobacco smoking and vaping products to 21 to curb the rise in youth smoking. https://t.co/busvy1kXmp #WA03

Yesterday marked the 100th anniversary of the House of Representatives passing the #19thAmendment to grant women the right to vote. This year we celebrate 100 years of women's right to #vote! #WA03 https://t.co/kMZmz9rCjf
It's #ArmedForcesDay please join me in thanking the men and women of the U.S. Armed Forces who dedicate their lives to keeping us safe! #WA03 https://t.co/evDfNlcpxT
Join me in taking a stand to #ProtectOurDams! #WA03 https://t.co/HwNZ0GDiAB

Our #dams are a critical source of affordable clean #energy because of the #hydropower they provide. Breaching the Snake River Dams is NOT in the best interests of the people of our region or our state and it ignores science showing that dams and fish DO coexist.

Thank you for your kind words in The Columbian Marilyn. I'm proud of my work on the ACE Kids Act and thrilled that the president signed this fiscally responsible piece of legislation into law! https://t.co/ssrJsebEX8 #WA03
Happy #MothersDay weekend to all of Southwest Washington's moms! #WA03 https://t.co/fuHtCC0uHV

Government-run health care could mean poorer care and less accessibility to treatment. As the Wall Street Journal put it "Mr. Sanders is promising miracles when what he’ll deliver is poorer care for everyone."(2/2) https://t.co/ayNY0v40Rr #WA03
Government-run #healthcare care is a dangerous idea that makes promises to the American people without a plan to deliver on those promises. (1/2)

Southwest Washington's small businesses are more than just job creators they showcase all that makes our region unique. This #SmallBusinessWeek support the small and family-owned businesses in our community! #WA03 https://t.co/4yUG3gyEDq

Still thrilled that my ACE Kids Act was signed into law! This legislation will--in a fiscally responsible manner--improve access to quality care for low-income children with some of the most severe medical needs. https://t.co/RsNCXpJkQA #WA03

The Preventing Maternal Deaths Act is a tremendous step towards tackling the serious issue of #MaternalMortality in our country. The U.S. needs to be on the forefront of this issue--thank you Jonathan for your kind words. https://t.co/4dBzTc4Nwc #WA03

I'm honored to be named to Congress' Science Space & Technology Committee where I'll work to ensure that women can compete for the best jobs in STEM and make sure that America is leading in #innovation. #WA03 https://t.co/kiD9BSHUa0
It is important for young women to know they can hold jobs in #STEM-related fields and to empower them to do so.

The president has signed my ACE Kids Act into law! This bipartisan legislation will help improve access to quality care for low-income #kids with some of the most severe medical needs while pushing our government to be smart w/ taxpayer dollars! #WA03 https://t.co/IB7WrMosjL
From our family to yours Happy #Easter! -Jaime https://t.co/sWdTbm547S
To all celebrating have a blessed #GoodFriday! https://t.co/34bdaBEV16
The ACE Kids Act empowers American families impacted by medical complexities to do just that. After passing Congress this bill is headed to the president's desk! https://t.co/Agi5l4SQvI #WA03
Every family should be able to pursue life-saving medical #treatment for their #kids regardless of their zip code.  https://t.co/Agi5l4SQvI

#Fish and #shellfish play a large part in Southwest Washington's #economy. From solving challenges posed by ocean acidification to protecting our native fish species from sea lions I stand with our region's #fisheries. https://t.co/Fu5iCGeDRD #WA03 https://t.co/DASLCdF1dE
Our neighbor #Oregon is seeing increased steelhead returns in the Upper Willamette River after sea lion removal. Glad to hear they are having success! https://t.co/dIyS9cQFFJ #WA03
Our bill to help the most vulnerable #children in our #healthcare system is headed to the presidents desk after passing Congress! https://t.co/6zvYNAWL2a #WA03
Any elected officials who do not support saving the lives of babies that survived #abortion should have to go on the record saying so. #BornAliveAct #WA03

Saving the lives of babies that are born alive shouldn't even be a debate. Today I joined my colleagues in signing the discharge petition to bring the Born-Alive Abortion Survivors Protection Act for a vote in the House. #BornAliveAct #WA03 https://t.co/GlOopNOO1m
Medicare for All would break a sacred promise and harm seniors’ access to care by forcing a system designed to support them to take on every other American.https://t.co/SAux2fxcpF #WA03 #Medicare

Thank you Brenda. As a working mom of 2 (soon to be 3!) I understand the importance of accessible #childcare first hand. It's an issue that hits close to home for me and I'll keep working to give parents across Southwest WA access to reliable childcare! https://t.co/IALU1kYY1b
Thank you Mr. Johnson. We mourn the loss of Jeremiah. He paid the ultimate sacrifice protecting us and we will be forever grateful for his service. https://t.co/9gYGPkbpoS

I'm working to ensure that those who serve & #veterans have access to resources & opportunity. From making it easier for those who serve to obtain home loans to improving the quality & accessibility of care for veterans I'll continue fighting for those who have fought for us https://t.co/YYlfUzEQfl
I'll continue working so that you can keep more of your paycheck and I'll support the growth of job opportunities in our region. https://t.co/MjIWaPBfEr #WA03 #economy #jobs

Being on the Joint Economic Committee means an even greater opportunity to improve our country's economic future and help families here in Southwest Washington https://t.co/MjIWaPBfEr #WA03 #economy #jobs
This is good news and Congress should take action to continue this trend that means #employers have to offer high pay and benefits to keep #workers. https://t.co/qJh5L6kiOY #WA03

It's important to give America's heroes access to the resources they need to achieve the dream of home ownership. It's the least we can do to say thank you especially to those who exhibited such a supreme bravery and dedication to our country. https://t.co/85ABu8V66u #WA03

Proponents of #MedicareForAll for All haven't figured out how to pay for their proposed government takeover of #healthcare. My opposition to Medicare for All is grounded in the reality that these unresolved astronomical costs could mean #Medicare for NONE. #WA03 https://t.co/EA7xYxuCtW

#Washington families need access to affordable quality #childcare. Our efforts would help to increase the number of childcare providers that families have the ability to choose from especially in the rural parts of our state. https://t.co/R2FFf7jTir #WA03

I fear #MedicareForAll for All will actually mean Medicare for None because of the astronomical cost of the massive government takeover of #healthcare. It’s always alarming when a bill’s sponsors won’t release a cost or how its paid for. #WA03 https://t.co/BFbvqy53Lb
(5/5) "Our doctor told us that often when women get this news they terminate the pregnancy.” Read the full op-ed here: https://t.co/dRYeFBg3XG
(4/5) "Being told that my wiggly kicking baby would certainly die felt like hell screaming in my face sucking all the air out of my lungs and leaving fear in its place."

(3/5) "We weren’t prepared for what we were told: Our #unborn baby had no chance of survival. There were no kidneys. She had bilateral renal agenesis also known as #PotterSyndrome meaning she would either miscarry or suffocate at birth because lungs wouldn’t develop.
(2/5)"I have some personal perspective on the matter. In 2013 during my second term in Congress my husband Dan and I were excited first-time parents when we went in for my 20-week ultrasound."

(1/5) “Radical legislation in #NewYork and #Virginia has brought late-term #abortion into the spotlight. Advocates justify the practice on the ground that as one put it 'terminations after 24 weeks are for severe fetal anomalies.'”

Each year on the third Monday in February we remember the birthdays of two great American presidents: George Washington and Abraham Lincoln. Happy Presidents' Day! #PresidentsDay #WA03 https://t.co/p7Qwbijj10

Camas has made it to the final six towns to be selected for Small Business Revolution Main Street. There are just four days left to vote vote for Camas here!: https://t.co/nuUVMV55mL #WA03 https://t.co/1Lw3jYca0v

Protecting our communities must be a priority. I'm proud to support oil train #safety regulations because when it comes to transporting hazardous materials through our region by #train the stakes are much too high to ignore. #WA03 https://t.co/az1PgkXoei

The sea lion problem haunted our region for decades. Now wildlife managers are empowered to take action and rectify the issue for the protection of our #salmon population and for the benefit of Southwest Washington residents. #WA03 https://t.co/tVfKBgYNHW

Dr. Martin Luther King Jr.'s leadership and courage paved the way for equality. Today we honor his legacy and remember that it is up to us to continue to promote equality in our country. #MLKDay2019 https://t.co/QUrCnUN49I
